item.description: Join us for dinner at Vapiano before we head over to watch the new Batman movie. Vapiano is an upscale cafeteria style restaurant with a good selection of salads, pasta and pizza. Prices are reasonable and the food is good. Even better- each guest gets their own tab! Dinner will be a little rushed since we're heading to the movie, but the service is fast and the theater is only a 5 minute walk. I will try to get there a little before 6:15.
item.how_to_find_us: Look for Catherine (see photo) inside the restaurant at our tables or call 774 232 0000!
item.name: Pre-Movie Dinner at Vapiano Boston
